title: List of Golden State Warriors head coaches - Wikipedia
snippet: Their second title was won as the Golden State Warriors in 1975, under coach Al Attles, who played with and coached the Warriors for 25 seasons. He was also the franchise's all-time leader in regular season games coached and wins until March 2025 when his record was surpassed by Steve Kerr, who ...

title: Steve Kerr - Wikipedia
snippet: Kerr is the first head coach in NBA history to lead his team to 67 or more wins in three consecutive seasons. He was named one of the Top 15 Coaches in NBA History in 2022, when the league commemorated its 75th anniversary. In March 2025, Kerr overtook Al Attles as the Warriors coach with the ...

title: Warriors Head Coaches | StatMuse
snippet: Steve Kerr has coached the Warriors from 2014-15 to 2025-26.
